# RFS Framework ê°œë°œ ê·œì¹™

## ğŸ”´ í•„ìˆ˜ ì¤€ìˆ˜ ê·œì¹™

### **[âš ï¸ í•„ìˆ˜ ì¤€ìˆ˜ ê·œì¹™ (Mandatory Rules)](./00-mandatory-rules.md)** 
**ëª¨ë“  ê°œë°œìì™€ AIëŠ” ë°˜ë“œì‹œ ì´ ê·œì¹™ì„ ë¨¼ì € ì½ê³  ì¤€ìˆ˜í•´ì•¼ í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤:**

## ğŸ¯ í•µì‹¬ ì›ì¹™

### 1. ì ˆëŒ€ ì˜ˆì™¸ë¥¼ ë˜ì§€ì§€ ë§ˆì„¸ìš”
```python
# âŒ ì˜ëª»ëœ ë°©ë²•
if error:
    raise Exception("Error occurred")

# âœ… ì˜¬ë°”ë¥¸ ë°©ë²•
if error:
    return Failure("Error occurred")
```

### 2. ë¶ˆë³€ì„±ì„ ìœ ì§€í•˜ì„¸ìš”
```python
# âŒ ì˜ëª»ëœ ë°©ë²•
items.append(new_item)

# âœ… ì˜¬ë°”ë¥¸ ë°©ë²•
new_items = items + [new_item]
```

### 3. íŒ¨í„´ ë§¤ì¹­ì„ í™œìš©í•˜ì„¸ìš”
```python
# âŒ if-elif-else ì²´ì¸
if isinstance(value, int):
    if value > 0:
        return "positive"
    else:
        return "non-positive"

# âœ… íŒ¨í„´ ë§¤ì¹­
match value:
    case int(x) if x > 0:
        return "positive"
    case int(x):
        return "non-positive"
    case _:
        return "not a number"
```

### 4. íƒ€ì… íŒíŠ¸ëŠ” í•„ìˆ˜ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤
```python
# âŒ íƒ€ì… íŒíŠ¸ ì—†ìŒ
def process(data):
    return transform(data)

# âœ… ì™„ì „í•œ íƒ€ì… íŒíŠ¸
def process(data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Result[ProcessedData, str]:
    return transform(data)
```

### 5. í•¨ìˆ˜ í•©ì„±ì„ í™œìš©í•˜ì„¸ìš”
```python
# âŒ ì¤‘ì²©ëœ í•¨ìˆ˜ í˜¸ì¶œ
result = function3(function2(function1(data)))

# âœ… RFS Framework ë‚´ì¥ HOF ì‚¬ìš©
from rfs.hof.core import pipe

process = pipe(function1, function2, function3)
result = process(data)
```

### 6. ë‚´ì¥ HOFë¥¼ ìš°ì„  ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì„¸ìš” â­
```python
# âŒ ì»¤ìŠ¤í…€ ë£¨í”„ êµ¬í˜„
filtered_items = []
for item in items:
    if condition(item):
        filtered_items.append(transform(item))

# âœ… RFS Framework ë‚´ì¥ HOF ì‚¬ìš©
from rfs.hof.collections import compact_map

filtered_items = compact_map(
    lambda item: transform(item) if condition(item) else None,
    items
)
```

## ğŸš€ ë¹ ë¥¸ ì‹œì‘

### í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸ ì„¤ì •

```bash
# í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸ ìƒì„±
mkdir my-project && cd my-project

# RFS Framework ì„¤ì¹˜
pip install rfs-framework

# ê°œë°œ ë„êµ¬ ì„¤ì¹˜
pip install pytest pytest-asyncio pytest-cov black mypy isort
```

### ê¸°ë³¸ êµ¬ì¡°

```
my-project/
â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ domain/          # ë„ë©”ì¸ ë ˆì´ì–´
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ entities/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ services/
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ value_objects/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ application/      # ì• í”Œë¦¬ì¼€ì´ì…˜ ë ˆì´ì–´
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ use_cases/
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ dto/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ infrastructure/   # ì¸í”„ë¼ ë ˆì´ì–´
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ adapters/
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ repositories/
â”œâ”€â”€ tests/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ unit/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ integration/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ fixtures/
â””â”€â”€ pyproject.toml
```

### ì˜ˆì œ ì½”ë“œ

```python
from rfs.core.result import Result, Success, Failure
from rfs.hof.core import pipe
from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass(frozen=True)
class User:
    id: str
    email: str
    name: str

def validate_email(email: str) -> Result[str, str]:
    if "@" not in email:
        return Failure("Invalid email format")
    return Success(email)

def create_user(email: str, name: str) -> Result[User, str]:
    return validate_email(email).map(
        lambda valid_email: User(
            id=generate_id(),
            email=valid_email,
            name=name
        )
    )

# ì‚¬ìš©
result = create_user("user@example.com", "John Doe")
if result.is_success():
    user = result.unwrap()
    print(f"User created: {user.name}")
else:
    print(f"Error: {result.unwrap_error()}")
```

## ğŸ“‹ ì²´í¬ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸

ê°œë°œ ì‹œ í™•ì¸í•´ì•¼ í•  ì‚¬í•­ë“¤:

- [ ] ëª¨ë“  í•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ Result íƒ€ì…ì„ ë°˜í™˜í•˜ëŠ”ê°€?
- [ ] ë°ì´í„° êµ¬ì¡°ê°€ ë¶ˆë³€ìœ¼ë¡œ ì„¤ê³„ë˜ì—ˆëŠ”ê°€?
- [ ] íƒ€ì… íŒíŠ¸ê°€ ì™„ì „í•œê°€?
- [ ] íŒ¨í„´ ë§¤ì¹­ì„ í™œìš©í–ˆëŠ”ê°€?
- [ ] **RFS Framework ë‚´ì¥ HOFë¥¼ ìš°ì„  ì‚¬ìš©í–ˆëŠ”ê°€?** â­
- [ ] `pipe()`, `compose()`, `curry()` ë“±ì„ í™œìš©í–ˆëŠ”ê°€?
- [ ] `compact_map()`, `first()`, `partition()` ë“±ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í–ˆëŠ”ê°€?
- [ ] ì˜ì¡´ì„±ì´ ì¸í„°í˜ì´ìŠ¤ì— ì˜ì¡´í•˜ëŠ”ê°€?
- [ ] í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì»¤ë²„ë¦¬ì§€ê°€ 80% ì´ìƒì¸ê°€?
- [ ] í•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ ìˆœìˆ˜ í•¨ìˆ˜ì¸ê°€?
- [ ] ì—ëŸ¬ ë©”ì‹œì§€ê°€ êµ¬ì²´ì ì¸ê°€?

## ğŸ”§ ê°œë°œ ë„êµ¬

### ì½”ë“œ í’ˆì§ˆ ê²€ì‚¬

```bash
# í¬ë§·íŒ…
black src/ tests/
isort src/ tests/

# íƒ€ì… ì²´í¬
mypy src/

# í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì‹¤í–‰
pytest --cov=src --cov-report=term-missing

# ëª¨ë“  ê²€ì‚¬ ì‹¤í–‰
make check  # Makefile ì„¤ì • í•„ìš”
```

### pre-commit ì„¤ì •

```yaml
# .pre-commit-config.yaml
repos:
  - repo: https://github.com/psf/black
    rev: 23.3.0
    hooks:
      - id: black
  
  - repo: https://github.com/pycqa/isort
    rev: 5.12.0
    hooks:
      - id: isort
  
  - repo: https://github.com/pre-commit/mirrors-mypy
    rev: v1.3.0
    hooks:
      - id: mypy
```
